PHRASE.LANG: You've tamed the lightning elemental dragon of Avalon! Now it will forever be your companion.[#Legal]
Vous avez dompté le dragon, la foudre élémentaire d'Avalon! Maintenant, il sera toujours votre compagnon.[#Legal]
Du hast den Blitz-Element-Drachen von Avalon gezähmt! Nun wird er für immer dein Gefährte sein.[#Legal]
Hai domato il fulmine elementale drago di Avalon! Ora sarà per sempre il vostro compagno.[#Legal]
Usted ha domado el rayo dragón elemental de Avalon! Ahora bien, siempre será su compañero.[#Legal]
You've tamed the lightning elemental dragon of Avalon! Now it will forever be your companion.[#Legal]
You've tamed the lightning elemental dragon of Avalon! Now it will forever be your companion.[#Legal]
You've tamed the lightning elemental dragon of Avalon! Now it will forever be your companion.[#Legal]
You've tamed the lightning elemental dragon of Avalon! Now it will forever be your companion.[#Legal]
